book.part:
Simplification of web
Develop the Controller class handling the requests and *-servlet.xml file for mapping each request onto the Controller class when developing Spring MVC based web application. This process occurs in every request and requires a lot of time. For this, Anyframe provides the common controllers and tag libraries handling the requests without developing the controller class. Also, we provide the way for integration of jQuery and Spring JS for developing the web in a simplistic and dynamic way. To simplify web development, the following are provided by Anyframe:
Provide common controller that processes request without controller class development
Business service calling
Command instance binding (VO, Map type support)
Duplicate form submission prevention
Model Validation using custom Validator class (extends Spring Validator class)
Model Validation using JSR-303 Validator
Initial data setting for view
Tiles Attribute setting
View name setting
Provide Anyframe tag library to set data to be used in the Common Controller class in the jsp page
Provide common controller for application development using VO type
Provide common controller for application development using Map type
Provide common controller for jQuery integration
Provide partial rendering and popup function when using tiles view layout
Provide Anyframe tag library for setting data using common controller
Provide Anyframe tag library for implementing the validation of client side simply
